title: Rovers eSports Looking For A Jg
body:
Hello Lads Rovers eSports are looking for a jg that can join and play with us in OOL Rovers have participated in Week 2 of OOL and came second sadly we didn't participate on the first week.

 Requirements are pretty standard.
- Diamond 1+
- Available 3-4 nights a week for scrims
- Available every 2nd Saturday & Sunday for OOL
- Working mic & Stable internet connection
- English Speaker

If u are interested can u pls add me in game(GrV Syzche) or you can comment down below
